We’ve purchased from this company before and he loved their shirts but this particular one is awful and uncomfortable. While it’s flattering and stylish, it’s pretty thick but extremely hard.. he actually had scratches around the collar area and it wasn’t even buttoned all the way! The wrinkles from the packaging took forever to iron out and by the end of the day, the shirt was extremely wrinkled again. Don’t recommend this for anyone ESPECIALLY those with sensitive skin!

评论概述: Stylish and Comfortable for Special Occasions
评论详情: I purchased this shirt for my son to wear to a wedding, and it was a fantastic choice! He absolutely loved the look, especially when paired with some other pieces we also purchased from Amazon.  The shirt is stylish, well-fitted, and has a modern yet classic vibe, perfect for both formal events and casual outings. The plaid collar adds a unique touch that makes it stand out from typical dress shirts. It’s also comfortable to wear, which is always a plus for long events like weddings.  Overall, this shirt was a great find, and I would definitely consider buying more styles from this brand. Highly recommend it for anyone looking for a mix of style and comfort!
